snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include a report on whether the makers of Candy Crush Saga, a popular mobile game, can continue churning out hits. Plus, New York’s attorney general hit Airbnb with a subpoena for user data.
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include a report on whether the makers of Candy Crush Saga, a popular mobile game, can continue churning out hits. Plus, New York’s attorney general hit Airbnb with a subpoena for user data.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Avoiding a Candy Crush Crash, and Airbnb Subpoenaed
